title: Licensed online casinos in Russia
description_infoCasino: The site was developed by specialists who have several successful projects in the iGaming industry behind them. They have created an interface that is easy to use. The visual design of the pages looks stylish and modern. To navigate the site, there is a menu with all sections on the main page. It helps users quickly navigate between pages. In one click, they can go to the section with games, bonuses, tournaments, live broadcasts, or open a support chat.The site was designed in dark colors, like many other similar projectsThe developers launched the official website of Drip Casino and made it available to users from many countries. The company's rules contain a list of prohibited areas, but it is small. Every player who has reached the age of 18 and lives in a country from which the company has not restricted access can register.The site has been translated into Russian and English. This made it popular among players not only from Russia and other CIS countries, but also from abroad.
secondPageText: The best site with the best games and real prizes
descriptionGames: Provider Betsoft chose Asia as the design theme for the machine. This emphasis can be seen both in the interface and in the symbols used. The playing field is placed against the backdrop of a residential area with small stylized houses. On either side of it hang multi-tiered Chinese lanterns and bunches of peppers and garlic. The ambience is complemented by smooth Asian music, which reacts to the player’s actions and changes on the field. During active rotations, the sound becomes more dynamic. It subsides if left inactive for a while.The playing field includes 5 rows and 4 reels, on which there are 20 paid lines. Their number is fixed - you cannot change it, as in classic slots. Winning combinations are formed in one direction - from left to right, that is, from the first reel. The theoretical return percentage (RTP) is 96.2%, the volatility of the slot is high. Spin results can be volatile and vary greatly from one session to the next. But this is compensated by a fairly large maximum payout - you can win up to x4000 bets.
